sources.name: STG_ACCT2
sources.script:
source(output(
		ACCT_ID as string,
		ACCT_TYP as string,
		ACCT_DESC as string,
		CASH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> STG_ACCT2

sinks.name: CUST_DTL_SUMRY1
sinks.script:
EXPTRANS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CUST_DTL_SUMRY1
